SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT item_group.item_group_id, name, item_category, address, like_count, review_count, item_img, location, created_at FROM item_group
LEFT JOIN item_group_tag USING (item_group_id) WHERE tag_id IN ( #{item} )
) item_group JOIN ( SELECT item_group_id, price price_per_day FROM item JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(start_date) start_date, MAX(end_date) end_date, AVG(price) price, AVG(discount_price) discount_per_day FROM item_schedule GROUP BY item_id ) USING (item_id) WHERE start_date >= #{startDate} AND end_date <= #{endDate} AND price >= #{overPrice} AND price <= #{underPrice} GROUP BY item_group_id ) USING (item_group_id)
ORDER BY like_count DESC
ORDER BY review_count DESC
ORDER BY item_group.created_at DESC
LIMIT (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
